headline: In the Swim
content:
Lake Buchanan No boat rentals: bring your own or hire a guide. The Buchanan Yacht Club has rates from $85 and free sunset cruises for guests (7932568; all area codes 512 unless specified). Crystal Cove Resort (793-6861) has cabins, houses, and condos from $56 to $182 a night. Club Pocahontas (7936128) serves up live music, dancing, steaks, and seafood. Black Rock Recreational area, on Texas Highway 261, has RV and tent sites and a sandy beach; Cedar Point Resource area, on FM 3014, is for primitive camping.

Inks LakeInks Lake State Park (7932223) has tent and RV sites, hiking trails, a swimming area, and a boat ramp. Rent fishing boats ($30 for five hours) or paddle boats ($8 an hour) at Inks Lake Concession (793-2033).

Lake LBJHorseshoe Bay Resort (800252-9363), on RR 2147, has the best golfing in the area, plus tennis and water sports; rates from $110. Old favorites around Kingsland: the Sandyland Resort (915-388-4521) has kitchenettes for $55; Valentine Lodges (915-388-4418) has cabins starting at $54; Llanorado (915-3884823), a fishing resort, has eight units at $38. Horseshoe Bay Marina (598-2521) rents sailboats, pontoons, and ski boats with a driver.

Lake Marble FallsRiverside Park (693-3910) has RV and tent sites, boat docks, and a sandy beach.

Lake TravisLakeway (261-6600) is the best-known tennis and golf resort on the lakes. Lodging starts at $130. At Lakeway Marina (261-7511), you can arrange a guided fishing trip ($120 for two people) or rent a sixty-foot yacht with a captain ($550 for two hours). Dutchmanâ€™s Landing Marina (267-7205) rents ski boats (no driver) for $35 an hour. Hurst Harbor Houseboats (800-342-3242) has fifty-footers for three-day weekends ($895) or four weekdays ($795). Pace Bend Recreation area, on FM 2322, has four hundred camping/picnic sites, while Bob Wentz Park at Windy Point (Comanche Trail off RR 620) has windsurfing and scuba diving.

Lake austin and Town LakeLake austin Yacht Club and Marina (327-2110) rents ski boats and jet-skis for $50 an hour. A canoe at Town Lake Canoe Rentals (478-3852) is $6 an hour. SHERI Fowler
